seasonmenus.title: PREMIER MAI 2024:
seasonmenus.info: May Day Menu settings at 12 & 15 Three-course Menu price 68€ with cheeses 78€

foods.title: ASPERGES et OEUF POCHÉ
foods.content:
White asparagus, poached organic egg & sauce Hollandaise
Wine recommend:Domaine Goulley, Chablis 2022 15/85€

foods.title: LANGOUSTINE et PAIN PERDU
foods.content:
Pain perdu fried to crisp, Langoustine, tarragon
and Beurre Blanc seasoned with dill
Wine recommend:Domaine Sancerre blanc 2022 15/85€

Cod cooked in browned butter, baby potato, silver onion,
spinach, Beurre Blanc and French caviar
Wine recommend:Arnaud Combier, Couette blanche 2022 15/65€
foods.title: CABILLAUD et CAVIAR
BEEF BAVETTE et CHOU DE PRINTEMPS
foods.content:
Grilled flank steak, roasted spring cabbage & organic carrots and Madeira sauce
Wine recommend:Arnaud Combier 2022 16/65€

foods.title: FROMAGE
foods.content:
Seasonal cheeses, with compotes and house made root bread
Wine recommend: D.Rocher-Corbin, Les Promesses 2017 13/75€

foods.title: CEREME BRÛLÈE
foods.content:
Liquorice flavoured creme brûlèe and juiced berries
Wine recommend:Lìlot Sauternes 2021 13€

foods.title: PAVLOVA d’ÉTÉ et SORBET à la RHUBARBE
foods.content:
“Vappu” Pavlova with rhubarb sorbet
Wine recommend:Moscato d'Asti 12€
